changelogversion.changelogimprovement: New material Icon
Added donation feature
Improved save operation feedback
Improved startup actions and dialogs
Improved save operation
changelogversion.changelogbug: Fixed DB issues on upgrade to new version
Fixed DB use flag update issue, during sync of Wi-Fi networks

changelogversion.changelogimprovement: Improved support for Lollipop devices with PAC support
Improved support for different devices
Restyled application following material guidelines
Added support for Lollipop devices (still missing PAC setup)
Added count of used proxies
Added possibility to delete a not used Proxy
Completely refactored application backend logic
Improved performances for devices with large number of Wi-Fi networks
changelogversion.changelogbug: Solved bug related to application close and restart

changelogversion.changelogimprovement: Improved support for 4.1, 4.2 and L Android API versions into [a href="https://github.com/shouldit/android-proxy"][b]APL[/b][/a]
Infrastructural changes on application dialogs
Added support for saving proxy configurations
Updated to latest version of APL with support for Android 4.4 devices
Updated to latest version of APL, with better support of proxy change notification to system
>Added infrastructure for proxy saving feature that will be added in next version
Updated to latest version of APL, with better support of proxy change notification to system
>Added infrastructure for proxy saving feature that will be added in next version
